title: DirectX Error
body: In the middle of a ranked game my league crashed and when I tried to reconnect it said DirectX Error. I noticed that my league has been glitching more than usual, but I never crashed before.  How am I suppose to fix this? I already got demoted twice and now I'm stuck in Bronze 3 and the fact that I can't climb because of this DirectX Error thing bothers me a lot.  Please respond quickly so that I can get this thing fix and start climbing.

replies.body: Crashing definitely doesn't help your goal, but I'd like to help!  A driver or some setting would cause a crash like this.  Did it come along with a bugsplat?  You should stick to a custom game for now to preserve your stats, and run through our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to troubleshoot.  Once you're in the clear, you should be fine to get back in-game!
